title: [Large-Scale] Instructor Workflow Optimization Strategies in Online Science Education

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic theories and research methodologies in the field of science
context.additional_context: A blended science education course applying student-centered pedagogy, combining real-time interaction via digital devices with self-directed learning.

learning_goals: Learners can explain science education design methods applying student-centered teaching approaches in online/offline environments.
Learners can establish and operate a formative assessment system using digital tools.
Learners can analyze instructor workload in blended learning and develop time management strategies.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
